casebody.data:
No. 10-8722. Tyrone Lamar Roberson, Petitioner v. South Carolina Department of Corrections, et al. 563 U.S. 920, 131 S. Ct. 1844,

179 L. Ed. 2d 777,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 2664. April 4, 2011.

Petition for writ of certio-rari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 396 Fed. Appx. 968.
